column4: wow I didn't realize there was a thing for that :)  I always just used apt-get dist-upgrade which didn't hold anything back
with 4GB ram you can loose a good chunk of it with 32 bits the mark is 3-3,5GB
not the ubuntu kernel nor the windows one both use pae but have problms with 4GB becouse of pci memory holes (unles you use highmeme on linux but the desktop kernel does not use it afaik)
